_header: He that smiteth with a stave of oak
_description: Medius part of a carol or refrain-song, with refrain, ‘Card lye down & whele stond styll / lett [ ] / [ ] tyll peny pot to þe nale tryll’ — fragment

NYPLDrexFr4184.Transcription:
He þat smytyth hy[ ] [ ] with a stafe off sokeShall have
                    crystes [ ]To þe staffe and sheAnd hyt be to hyr alone evyll
                    mot[ ] thoe to the stafand she card lye he t…
NYPLDrexFr4184.Note:
Portions of pages cut away to fit as endleaves to seventeenth-century
                    song book.
